Name: Trick-Or-Treat
Effect: Single Target. Add the Ghost Type to the Target's Type. (ie Pikachu will now be "Electric/Ghost", Charizard will not be "Fire/Flying/Ghost") If the Target already has a third Type attached, replace it.
Description: The Pok√©mon takes the target trick-or-treating. The target gets a ghost costume which somehow cannot be removed without a medium's help.
